content: Such forward-looking statements are subject to risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ materially from expectations including among other things; the uncertainties inherent in research and development of our product candidates; risks to our business related to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic; uncertainty regarding whether and when we will be able to submit a biologics license application for Covaxin to the FDA; and whether and when we will receive regulatory approvals for Covaxin in the U.S., Canada, or Mexico.
